briefTitle: Confirmatory Study of MT-2412 in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (Add-on Study of Teneligliptin)
officialTitle: Confirmatory Study of MT-2412 in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (Add-on Study of Teneligliptin in Patients With Inadequate Glycemic Control on Canagliflozin)
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of co-administration of Canagliflozin (TA-7284) and Teneligliptin (MP-513) once daily for 24 weeks in Japanese patients with Type 2 diabetes mellitus who are receiving treatment with Canagliflozin and have inadequate glycemic control.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Percentage of Glycated Hemoglobin (HbA1c)
